name: Rise of the Spitfire
description:
Rise of the Spitfire: About this game: 

Pop balloons and shoot down enemy aircraft to get a new high score. 

Rise of the Spitfire is a 2D pixel shoot'em up designed for the Stoke-On-Trend games jam. The overall theme was Stoke-On-Trent with 8 diversifiers, we were given Spitfire as our diversifier, so we designed a mobile-friendly game centred around destroying as many things as possible without dying all while not being destroyed yourself.

Windows controls:

- Play on desktop for the best experience using this version

- W,A,S,D for movement

- Space to shoot

HTML:

The game should run embedded in your browser, no downloads required

- If running the game from a phone then ensure that it is played landscape.

Controls: 

- Click to move to position
- Player shoots whenever the mouse button pressed
